p: LX designed and tested the pan-CoV assay at Duke University, and drafted the manuscript. GCG conceived the study, guided the work, and helped draft the manuscript. DDE offered expert advice in laboratory experiments and edited the manuscript. RAB and KK and helped draft the manuscript. NAA and RAB assisted LX with laboratory assessments. KKC and STT evaluated the assay at Duke-NUS Medical School. ESB, VNB, STT conducted the field studies that provided specimens for the pan-CoV assayâ€™s assessment. All authors reviewed and approved of the manuscript.
